statements: SELECT * FROM book_recommendations;
SELECT user_id, book_title, author FROM book_recommendations WHERE genre = 'Fantasy';
SELECT * FROM book_recommendations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT book_title, genre, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM book_recommendations GROUP BY genre;
SELECT user_id, book_title, date_read FROM book_recommendations WHERE date_read BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM book_recommendations WHERE genre = 'Mystery' ORDER BY rating DESC, date_read ASC
SELECT user_id, book_title, author, date_read FROM book_recommendations WHERE author LIKE 'J%' AND rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY author ASC, date_read DESC
SELECT book_title, genre, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM book_recommendations GROUP BY genre ORDER BY average_rating DESC
SELECT user_id, book_title, author, genre FROM book_recommendations WHERE date_read BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_books_read FROM book_recommendations GROUP BY author HAVING num_books_read >= 3 ORDER BY num_books_read DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE published_year > 2000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books ORDER BY published_year DESC, author ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT title, author, published_year FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' AND published_year < 2000
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users ORDER BY username
SELECT user_id, title FROM books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fantasy';
SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY publish_year DESC;
SELECT user_id, genre FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, genre FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE genre = 'Science Fiction';
SELECT * FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fantasy' AND publish_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY publish_year DESC;
SELECT name, genre, publish_year FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id JOIN books ON user_preferences.genre = books.genre ORDER BY publish_year ASC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM books WHERE genre = 'Sci-Fi' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, book_id, date_read FROM user_reading_history WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT user_id, genre_preference FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC, genre_preference DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' AND published_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY published_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, b.title, r.date_read FROM users u INNER JOIN user_reading_history r ON u.user_id = r.user_id INNER JOIN books b ON r.book_id = b.book_id WHERE r.rating = 5 ORDER BY r.date_read DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, publication_year FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT user_id, book_id, rating FROM reading_history ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT username, title, recommendation_score FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN books b ON r.book_id = b.book_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE publication_year > 2000;
SELECT user_id, genre FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT users.username, books.title, reading_history.date_read FROM users JOIN reading_history ON users.user_id = reading_history.user_id JOIN books ON reading_history.book_id = books.book_id;

SELECT users.username, COUNT(recommendations.book_id) AS num_recommendations FROM users LEFT JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id GROUP BY users.user_id HAVING num_recommendations > 3;
